title: Property Table in EXT_structural_metadata
description: Properties conforming to a class, organized as property values stored in binary columnar arrays.

name.description: The name of the property table, e.g. for display purposes.

class.description: The class that property values conform to. The value must be a class ID declared in the `classes` dictionary.

count.description: The number of elements in each property array.

properties.description: A dictionary, where each key corresponds to a property ID in the class' `properties` dictionary and each value is an object describing where property values are stored. Required properties must be included in this dictionary.
